author: Dave Jimenez
comment: Works great and actually able to look at and change settings
title: Nice

author: Nev Shepard
comment: What is a "short while"? I've been waiting a half hour! How do I push this watch face into my moto 360? UPDATE : WORKING! BEAUTIFUL!
title: Help!

author: Earl Sarain
comment: Drop the decimal on temp just round value and then make font larger.  Note users = Adjust setting for weather to longer time to save battery
title: Just need to adjust temperature

author: Jerry Jackson
comment: It is great I've been using it all the time lately thank you thank you

author: M PottyMouth
comment: This is a great functional watch face.  Information is displayed in a very easy to read format.
title: Great functional watch face!

author: Joe Scanlon
comment: Whenever I'm not running my own custom faces this is the only watch face I'll use.
title: Great Addition

author: Caleb Schlossin
comment: When there is a notification or podcast/music playing, the digital time is cut off and can't be seen. I noticed the "Digital" default watch face on Moto 360 only shows a limited player at the bottom, so that the full time can be seen. That improvement to this watch face would improve it significantly.
title: Great functionality and display, but...

author: Nuno Saldanha
comment: ...dots not visible. Wind and temperature values need more space. For example: 14.2 looks like 142. Temperature is also way off! Please fix for full rating!
title: Great looking watch face but...

author: Brad Galloway
comment: When it is in dimmed mode and a card comes up, the card will be transparent and make both the card and watch face unreadable. Otherwise it's great.
title: Good looking, not great on function

author: Jim Thomas
comment: Love the watch face. Everything is nice. Looks good. Only issue would be that the temp and the wind speed could use better spacing. Looks like 22 mph winds when its 2.2 mph.  I also notice that the weather is pretty off too.  Prehaps an option to choose different weather apps? Or at least weather channel.   Other than that a++
title: Love it well worth the buck

author: michael Bigos
comment: One of the best watch faces but kills battery fast.
title: Nice Design

author: Skrill Dilly
comment: I love every face you do. I don't want a wack analog clock. I'd buy a regular watch for that. These are watches of the future and deserve faces that show such. All needed information like phone/watch battery, weather hi/Lo, current weather, digital clock, etc are well designed. Color is amazing. A tad bit battery hungry but otherwise amazing. If you can insert a bright future blue and red it'll be even more sweet. Looking forward to future updates from you.
title: OMMFG

author: udi levy
comment: the temperature and wind fonts (values) are to small and bold which makes them unreadable
title: temperature and wind fonts are unreadable

author: A Google User
comment: This could easily be my favorite of all the watchfaces I have purchased from this dev. The temp and wind speed font needs to be increased a point or two. It's 12.6°F & 6.9mph but it looks like 126°F & 69mph.
title: Almost Great

author: Ryan stancliffe
comment: Great looking watch face and it isn't  nearly as much of a battery hog as other watch faces. Well done developer.

author: Giovonni Fareed
comment: Needs small improvements otherwise it's pretty cool
title: Getting there

author: Chris Pugh
comment: Looks like this face was laid out pixel-perfect for the 360, so the higher-res Huawei Watch renders it poorly. Get it if you have a 360, though - it looks great.
title: Looks absolutely terrible on Huawei Watch, but points for a nice concept

author: Robert Turley
comment: App you up too much battery life and should've of recommended me a better face at least

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
If you have more question about that,Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Refund?
